abstract.t: This memo describes a reference to third generation partner shipproject (3GPP) defined traffic flow template (TFT) as a trafficselector in the flow based routing mechanism described in the flowbinding draft [1]. This memo, further specifies a new trafficselector sub-option format to be used with the flow binding mobilityoption defined in draft [1], in order to transport the TFT referencefrom the mobile node to its home agent in a 3GPP SAE (servicearchitecture evolution) scenario.
